snippet: In Libya, the Islamic State captured a critical power plant, while in Iraq, gunmen in suicide vests attacked a council building in Amiriyat al Falluja, southwest of Baghdad.
abstract: Islamic State captures strategic power plant near its stronghold in Libyan city of Surt; suicide gunmen attack council building in Amiriyat al Falluja, near Baghdad.

byline.original: By DAVID D. KIRKPATRICK and KAREEM FAHIM
byline.contributor: David D. Kirkpatrick reported from Cairo, and Kareem Fahim from Baghdad. Suliman Ali Zway contributed reporting from Tripoli, Libya, and Falih Hassan from Baghdad.

lead_paragraph: In Libya, the Islamic State captured a critical power plant, while in Iraq, gunmen in suicide vests attacked a council building in Amiriyat al Falluja, southwest of Baghdad.

headline.main: ISIS Stages Attacks in Iraq and Libya, Despite U.S. Airstrikes
headline.print_headline: Islamic State Militants Stage Attacks in Iraq and Libya

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
